label: 真言宗未決文
対訳語: Unresolved Issues on the Shingon School
本: The Weaving of Mantra:  Kūkai and the Construction of Esoteric Buddhist Discourse . Columbia University Press . 1999
見出し読み: しんごんしゅうみけつもん
説明文: A work by Hossō priest Tokuitsu (781?-842?).  Addressing to Kūkai, Tokuitsu lays out his doubts about the validity of Kūkai's claims (p. 204).  [法相、徳一、空海]
